Title: uv format: Code Formatting Comes to uv (experimentally!)
Description:
The latest uv release (0.8.13) quietly introduced an experimental new command that Python developers have been waiting for: uv format. This addition brings code formatting directly into uvâ€™s toolkit, eliminating the need to juggle multiple tools for basic Python development workflows.
What is uv format?
